mapper.sql: logid, main_type, sub_type, order_id, state_time, state_ctime, state_ntime, interval_time, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_notice_over WHERE 1=1 AND (logid = #{logid} OR logid LIKE '%'||#{logid}||'%') '%'+#{logid}+'%') CONCAT('%', #{logid}, '%')) ORDER BY state_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_notice_over( logid, main_type, sub_type, order_id, state_time, state_ctime, state_ntime, interval_time, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{main_type}, #{sub_type}, #{order_id}, #{state_time}, #{state_ctime}, #{state_ntime}, #{interval_time}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_notice_over SET logid = #{logid}, main_type = #{main_type}, sub_type = #{sub_type}, order_id = #{order_id}, state_time = #{state_time}, state_ctime = #{state_ctime}, state_ntime = #{state_ntime}, Interval_time = #{Interval_time}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE logid = #{logid}
